com.percussion.publisher.client
Interface IPSContentItemContext

public interface IPSContentItemContext

This class object is what is sent to the publisher plugin. This has all the required parameters to publish or unpublish the content. There are no set methods to make the object almost read only except setItemElement() which plugin class should never use. The publisher context which can be accessed from this object can proide all information that is not specific to the current item and this object itself can provode data about the current content item.

getCustomProperties

HashMap getCustomProperties()
Get the map or all custom properties. These properties are typically used for custom plugins.

Returns:
a map of custom properties. The key names will be the property names as String and values will be property values as String. Never null, may be empty.

getRoot

String getRoot()
Returns the publishing root of the destination site.

Returns:
the publishing root for this item, might be null. If a trailing "/" or "\" exists, it is stripped off.
